description: Yuugen Kaisha is an organisation specialising in solving all manner of supernatural mysteries. Led by the alluring http://anidb.net/ch40913 [Kisaragi Ayaka], the company can call upon the skills of a diverse roster of employees, be they http://anidb.net/ch40914 [clairvoyants], http://anidb.net/ch40922 [exorcists], http://anidb.net/ch40923 [fire mages] or... http://anidb.net/ch40919 [accountants].
name: Yuugen Kaisha
